author: Jacob Kienlen
description: Amazon announced the first four-day Prime Day for 2025.
title: A Longer Amazon Prime Day Doesn't Necessarily Mean More Deals

author: Eric Song
description: With a smaller 42" screen size and 4K (104ppi) resolution, this TV fits right at home on a PC desk.
title: The 42" LG Evo C4 4K OLED TV Drops to the Lowest Price Ever: Doubles as a Gaming Monitor

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: The Star Trek franchise is resurrecting William Shatner's Captain James T. Kirk once more, as Kirk takes charge in the bleak, futuristic series Star Trek: The Last Starship.
title: Star Trek: The Last Starship Resurrects Captain Kirk in the 31st Century

author: Myles Obenza
description: The cheapest its been since it was released in 2023.
title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie Vinyl Soundtrack Drops to Its Lowest Price Ever

author: Jacqueline Thomas
description: Microsoft has announced a collaboration with AMD for the next Xbox console - which sounds a lot like a gaming PC.
title: It Sure Sounds Like the Next Xbox Will Be a Gaming PC

author: Eric Song
description: The best OLED TV deal today.
title: The 77" LG Evo C4 4K OLED Smart TV Drops to Under $1,800 And Includes an Extended 4 Year Warranty

author: Michael Cripe
description: Sony and Bungie’s Marathon reboot has been delayed to a new, unspecified release date.
title: Marathon Delayed as Bungie Promises to Reveal New Release Date This Fall

author: Erik Adams
description: The new Shudder's series' fun slasher premise is undercut by its length, which can’t sustain the excitement of a slasher mystery for eight full episodes.
title: Hell Motel Review

author: Blythe Dujardin
description: Final Destination Bloodlines is now available to watch at home with a new Blu-ray collection set to release next month.
title: Final Destination Bloodlines Hits Digital as New Blu-ray Collection Goes Up for Preorder

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: A fan-made Godzilla set has been approved in the latest round of LEGO Ideas reviews, confirming a new collaboration for the brick-building giant.
title: The First Godzilla LEGO Set Has Officially Been Confirmed

author: Myles Obenza
description: The Final Fantasy x Magic: The Gathering crossover features reprints of classic Magic cards with iconic art from the legendary RPG series. These are the most valuable cards in the Final Fantasy: Through the Ages collection.
title: I've Found The 16 Most Valuable Final Fantasy: Through the Ages MTG Cards Right Now

author: Erik Adams
description: The new Pixar featire boasts dazzling animation – and even more striking emotional depth.
title: Elio Review

author: Lex Briscuso
description: James Cameron’s beloved sci-fi film The Abyss has been removed from Disney+ in the UK due to the inclusion of a banned scene.
title: James Cameron's The Abyss Pulled From Disney+ in the UK Because of Banned 'Rat Abuse' Scene

author: Tom Phillips
description: Minecraft was never designed with visuals as its key selling point. With an endless sandbox landscape and unlimited customisation, Mojang's now-familiar pixellated graphics were never the main focus.
title: Minecraft Vibrant Visuals Update Finally Gives Mojang's Game a Long-Awaited Visual Overhaul — but Only on Compatible Devices

author: Matt Kim
description: We played Lego Party! A brand-new four person party game that's sure to get you and your friends fighting it out to see who is the ultimate Lego champion.
title: Lego Party Proves That There’s Room for More Than Just Mario Party

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Microsoft has announced a partnership with AMD to power the next generation of Xbox, including its first-party future Xbox consoles.
title: Microsoft Confirms First-Party Next-Generation Xbox Consoles, Announces Deal With AMD and Promises Full Backwards Compatibility With Your Existing Xbox Library

author: Eric Song
description: Sounds almost too good to be true.
title: AliExpress Just Listed a Nintendo Switch 2 Mario Kart World Tour Bundle for Lower than Retail Price

author: Tom Marks
description: So far this is an engaging co-op extension of the Control universe.
title: FBC: Firebreak Review in Progress

author: Eric Van Allen
description: Pik-Sen Lim, an actress known for roles across British and Malaysian television, has died at age 80. Lim also played an important role in video games, as the narrator for the opening cinematics of Dark Souls 1 and Dark Souls 3.
title: Pik-Sen Lim, Mind Your Language Actress and Dark Souls Narrator, Dies at 80

author: Lex Briscuso
description: In today’s interesting crossover news, Karlovy Vary International Film Festival is set to screen the world premiere of a cinematic cut of the hit video game Kingdom Come: Deliverance II.
title: A Cinematic Cut of Kingdom Come: Deliverance II Will Get the Film Festival Treatment

author: Meg Koepp
description: IGN's Mario Kart World map includes locations for P-Switch Missions, Peach Medallions, and ? Panels!
title: Mario Kart World Interactive Map is Now Available

author: Ben Williams
description: Amazon Prime members can claim six free PC games ahead of Prime Day 2025, including Tomb Raider Remastered, Saints Row IV, and more.
title: Amazon Kicks Off Its Early Prime Day 2025 Offers With Several Free Games for Prime Members

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: The heavy metal horror comedy Deathgasm is getting a comic book spinoff, and it's going to feature cameos from the stars of 2014's What We Do In the Shadows. Check out our exclusive first look.
title: Deathgasm 1.5 Graphic Novel to Feature a What We Do In the Shadows Crossover

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Dying Light: The Beast game director Nathan Lemaire walks you through the weapons you'll wield in Techland's upcoming standalone first-person melee/shooter/parkour open-world action-adventure in which you once again play Kyle Crane, who's out for revenge on the people who experimented on him and turned him into the eponymous Beast.
title: Dying Light: The Beast – Weapons Overview | IGN First

author: Erik Adams
description: F1: The Movie follows the sports movie playbook almost perfectly, finding ways to be just that much better at nearly every stage of its 156-minute runtime – creating a super fun racecar flick in the process that eventually finds its way to victory lane.
title: F1: The Movie Review

author: Michael Cripe
description: After months of rumors and searching, DC has finally selected Tom Rhys Harries as the actor who will play legendary Batman villain and shapeshifter Clayface in the upcoming standalone DCU film.
title: DCU Horror Film Clayface Finds Its Star in Tom Rhys Harries

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: Monty Python and the Holy Grail is getting a 4K steelbook that's now available to preorder. It's currently listed for $39.99 and is set to release on August 26.
title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail Is Getting a 4K Steelbook, Preorder Today

author: Tom Phillips
description: Years before Fortnite became a battle royale phenomenon, Epic Games' shooter originally launched as a PVE game, Save the World, where teams worked together to survive against waves of zombies.
title: 8 Years After Fortnite's Original Save the World Mode Launched, Epic Announces New 4-Player PVE Offering That's Essentially Helldivers With Lego

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Microsoft has confirmed the Xbox Game Pass June 2025 Wave 2 lineup, which includes big hitters such as Call of Duty: WWII, the Warcraft RTS trilogy, and Rematch.
title: Call of Duty: WWII and Warcraft RTS Trilogy Headline Xbox Game Pass June 2025 Wave 2 Lineup

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Oni Press' Adventure Time series is kicking off a new storyline and a fresh jumping-on point. Check out our exclusive preview of Adventure Time #5.
title: Adventure Time #5 Is a Perfect Starting Point for the Oni Press Series

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Cartoonist Maia Kobabe's Gender Queer is one of the most frequently banned books in the US, a fact that is now fueling a fundraising campaign called "Fight Censorship, Read Comics."
title: Fight Censorship, Read Comics Fundraising Campaign Highlights 'The Most Banned Book in American Schools'

author: Simon Cardy
title: I'm Reviewing Death Stranding 2, Here's What I Thought of the Original

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Developer Mūn Mūn Games has announced Out Fishing, a seemingly benign first-person fishing simulator. Even its title suggests that it's cozy and chill. And it is...during the day. But when nighttime rolls around in the game, it turns into a horror game. It's in development for PC.
title: Out Fishing, a First-Person Horror Fishing Simulator, Announced for PC

author: Dan Stapleton
title: Tron: Catalyst Review

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: What’s happening with Batman movies? It sounds like things are moving at a glacial pace for the live-action incarnation of the Caped Crusader, with DC Universe co-chief James Gunn admitting: "Batman's my biggest issue in all of DC right now."
title: James Gunn Says Batman Is 'My Biggest Issue in All of DC Right Now': 'I'm Not Interested in a Funny, Campy Batman'

author: Chris Reed
description: Everything you need to know to preorder Donkey Kong Bananza, the upcoming game starring everyone's favorite cartoon primate, including where it's available, how much it costs, and more.
title: Donkey Kong Bananza Is Now Up for Preorder for the Switch 2

author: Chris Reed
description: Everything you need to know to preorder Kirby and the Forgotten Land + Star-Crossed World for Nintendo Switch 2, including where it's available, how much it costs, and what comes in the box.
title: Kirby and the Forgotten Land + Star-Crossed World for Nintendo Switch 2 Is Up for Preorder

author: Chris Reed
description: Everything you need to know in order to preorder Super Mario Party Jamboree Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Jamboree TV, including what's upgraded, what's new, how much it costs, and where to buy it.
title: Super Mario Party Jamboree + Jamboree TV for Nintendo Switch 2 Is Up for Preorder

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Nintendo has been working with Japan’s major online marketplaces to tackle misleading Switch 2 listings, with Yahoo Japan Auctions opting to outright ban resales of Nintendo’s next-gen offering. However, despite these measures, there have been a number of different scams in Japan involving second-hand Switch 2 consoles. Resellers sending out empty Switch 2 boxes or even photos of the console instead of the real deal are two scams that have been common enough to attract mainstream Japanese news coverage.
title: Sneaky Nintendo Switch 2 Scams Prompt Warnings From Japanese TV News

author: Christian Wait
description: As of June 17, Donkey Kong Bananza and Borderlands 4 preorders are live on Amazon starting at $69.99. Save $300 on the Samsung Neo G9 monitor, get the MacBook Air M3 for $699, and more.
title: Deals For Today: Donkey Kong Bananza and Borderlands 2 Preorders Are Live

author: Scott Collura
description: Three decades after its release, Val Kilmer and Joel Schumacher's Batman Forever remains a stylistic detour that dared to show Gotham in a different light. Literally.
title: Batman Forever at 30: How the Val Kilmer Sequel Was as Much a Studio Recalibration as a Fresh New Take on the Dark Knight

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: In what is sure to be one of the biggest new comics of 2025, Skybound has revealed that Robert Kirkman and David Finch are joining forces for a violent action epic called Skinbreaker.
title: Skinbreaker Is a New Action Epic From Superstars Robert Kirkman and David Finch

author: Matt Purslow
description: Bitmap Bureau, the developers behind the upcoming Terminator 2D: No Fate, joined us to discuss how they're planning on turning 1990s movie gold into a video game success worthy of the film's classic status.
title: Why The 2025 Terminator 2 Retro Game NEEDED To Be Made

author: Tom Phillips
description: Disney's long-awaited next Pirates of the Caribbean movie will see the return of some familiar faces, franchise producer Jerry Bruckheimer has confirmed. But will that include Captain Jack Sparrow actor Johnny Depp?
title: Pirates of the Caribbean 6 Producer Teases Returning Cast, as Orlando Bloom Says It's Time to 'Get the Band Back Together'

author: Vikki Blake
description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 developer Sandfall Interactive is "currently exploring a wide range of future improvements."
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Fans Hope 'Future Improvements' Include Quicksave, Photo Mode, And 'More Swimsuits For Gustave'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Switch 2 users have reported having the vibration effect of their controllers turned off, should the console detect you making "prolonged use" of their rumble feature.
title: Nintendo Will Turn Off Your Switch 2's Rumble if It Detects 'Prolonged Use'

author: Matt Purslow
description: From a fresh-looking Marvel fighting game to a horror classic reborn and a brand new Resident Evil, these are our most anticipated games from across the Summer of Gaming.
title: The Most Anticipated Games From Summer of Gaming

author: Tom Phillips
description: Earlier this year, Pokémon Go maker Niantic announced it was selling its portfolio of mobile games to Monopoly Go owner Scopely for $3.5bn, in a move that was alternately celebrated and scorned by the game's devoted playerbase.
title: Pokémon Go Director Talks New Ownership, Says Saudi Backing Won't See Demands Such as Cristiano Ronaldo Added to the Game: 'Yeah, That's a Little Bit Not Our Vibe'

author: Vikki Blake
description: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach creator, Hideo Kojima, reportedly changed the game halfway through because playtesting results were "too good," and he doesn't want his work to be "mainstream."
title: Hideo Kojima Made Significant Changes To Death Stranding 2 Because Playtesters Thought It Was 'Too Good'

author: Tom Phillips
description: As the wait continues for news of Ubisoft's long-delayed Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time remake, the publisher has reassured fans it is still persevering with the project, and instead recommended something else to play while you wait.
title: As 5-Year Wait for Prince of Persia: Sands of Time Remake Continues, Ubisoft Thanks Fans for Patience and Recommends You Play the Rogue Prince of Persia Instead

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The mods looking after the SnyderCut subreddit have deleted a post calling on fans to review bomb the upcoming Superman movie and issued a statement to their community members.
title: SnyderCut Subreddit Issues Statement After James Gunn Dismisses Fan Calling for Mass Superman Review Bomb Campaign

author: Vikki Blake
description: As Stellar Blade tops 3 million sales worldwide, director Hyung-tae Kim has revealed the sequel, which has already been confirmed, will have a "serious" story.
title: As Stellar Blade Hits 3 Million Copies Sold, Dev Says Sequel Will Have the 'Rich' Narrative Missing From the Original

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo Switch 2 users have reported being blocked from accessing the console's online services until further notice, and believe their use of the MIG Switch cartridge is the cause.
title: Nintendo Launches Opening Salvo in War Against Switch 2 Game Pirates, as MIG Switch Users Report Online Service Bans

author: Vikki Blake
description: Dune: Awakening developer Funcom has said it's "working on" issues that are bugging players when they head out into the Deep Desert, including respawn times.
title: Dune: Awakening Dev Working on PvP and Deep Desert Issues as New Concurrent User Peak Record Is Set

author: Eric Van Allen
description: Elden Ring Nightreign has some pretty sick gear drops. And sometimes, you might even want to let other people try out that gear, even though you want to also use them. Well, a gear duplication glitch makes it easy to share the loot, for as long as it's around.
title: An Item Duplication Glitch in Elden Ring Nightreign Makes It Easier To Share the Wealth

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has included an infamous recurring Easter egg in Switch 2 launch title Mario Kart World, fans have discovered.
title: Mario Kart World's Character Select Screen Hides a Legendary Nintendo Easter Egg

author: Robert Anderson
description: Amazon has officially announced that Prime Day will run for four days this year, from July 8 to 11, marking its longest event yet since launching a decade ago.
title: Amazon Has Revealed Prime Day 2025 Will Be a Four Day Shopping Event

author: Peer Schneider
title: Celebrate The Legend of Zelda on Switch 2 With IGN Guides

author: Adam Mathew
description: Clear some digital shelf space and maybe cancel a social plan or two, because there's a fresh drop of discounted gaming goodness.
title: AU Deals: Big Cuts on Controllers, New Lows For Doom Dark Ages, Space Marine 2, Astro Bot, and More!

author: Eric Song
description: The best noise canceling headphones of 2025.
title: The New Sony WH-1000XM6 Noise Cancelling Headphones Are on Sale for the First Time
